data.subject: ComfyUI_Mexx_Poster
data.question: What is the purpose of ComfyUI_Mexx_Poster?
data.answer: ComfyUI_Mexx_Poster is used for editing images with HTML templates to create customized images, such as game cards, posters, and commercial ads.

data.subject: ComfyUI_Mexx_Poster
data.question: Can you provide an example of a demo file for ComfyUI Workflow using ComfyUI_Mexx_Poster?
data.answer: Yes, the ComfyUI Workflow DEMO file used with ComfyUI_Mexx_Poster is available at [workflow-lcm-poster.json](workflow-lcm-poster.json).

data.subject: ComfyUI_Mexx_Poster
data.question: Which style plugin is used in the ComfyUI Workflow DEMO file?
data.answer: The style plugin used in the ComfyUI Workflow DEMO file is [ComfyUI_Mexx_Styler](https://github.com/SoftMeng/ComfyUI_Mexx_Styler).

data.subject: ComfyUI_Mexx_Poster
data.question: What is the LCM model used in the ComfyUI Workflow DEMO file?
data.answer: The LCM model used in the ComfyUI Workflow DEMO file is [mexxldimsdxllcm2](https://civitai.com/models/217692/mexxldimsdxllcm2).

data.subject: ComfyUI_Mexx_Poster
data.question: What should be done if the LCM model is not used?
data.answer: If the LCM model is not used, then the sampler and the number of steps for the sampler need to be adjusted.

data.subject: ComfyUI_Mexx_Poster
data.question: Are there any examples of generated images using ComfyUI_Mexx_Poster?
data.answer: Yes, the generated images using ComfyUI_Mexx_Poster are available at [00155.jpg](demo%2F00155.jpg), [00151.jpg](demo%2F00151.jpg), [00156.jpg](demo%2F00156.jpg), [00152.jpg](demo%2F00152.jpg), [00153.jpg](demo%2F00153.jpg), and [00154.jpg](demo%2F00154.jpg).
